attributes.action: increase road safety at the round-a-bout on the junctions of Brownley Road, Simonsway and Ruddpark Road in Wythenshawe, follwing several major accidents
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Almost five and a half years after my first letter to my MP regarding this, something seriously does need to be done. Accidents are now occurring on a more regular basis, and it is time something is done about it, before someone unfortunately ends up being killed, as serious injuries have already happened. Action needs to be taken promptly
